column4: Does anyone have any experience with Ubuntu on the Acer Aspire 1?

My Acer Aspire 1 has Ubuntu 8.10 on it currently, and the wireless suddenly shut off. It has a toggle switch on the front, but the indicators don't work. How can I enable the wireless through the software?
i've  had that happen before, but i usually restart X, and when i log back in, it works
can't explain it, mine is fine
